title: Traveling to Brazil with Davidoff....
itunes:title: Traveling to Brazil with Davidoff....
description: This week we take a cigar from The Cigar Authority Care Package, the Davidoff Escurio Robusto as our first cigar. We talk with Chuck Morrison and see if he got his super bowl ring....We are also joined by The Cigar Authority version of Regis Philbin and David Brenner as Victor Vitale joins us.We also break down the new issue of Cigar Journal and all the usual shenanigans known as The Cigar Authority﻿
